Class FieldType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.fieldType.types.FieldType
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomCalculatedNoConfig, CustomCheckBoxSingle, CustomExtensibleSelect, CustomHTMLLabel, CustomItemPicker, CustomProjectPicker, CustomRichTextEditor, CustomSelectMultiple, CustomSelectParentChild, CustomSelectParentChildGrandchild, CustomSelectParentChilds, CustomSelectSimple, CustomTextArea, CustomTextBoxDate, CustomTextBoxDouble, CustomTextBoxInteger, CustomTextBoxText, CustomUserPicker, SystemFieldType

    public abstract class FieldType
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the design time and runtime types and renderers for system and custom fields
